id.description: Unique identifier for the fish catch

species.description: Species or type of fish caught

weight.description: Weight of the fish in pounds

length.description: Length of the fish in inches

location.description: Location where the fish was caught

bait.description: Type of bait or lure used

datecaught.description: Date when the fish was caught

timeOfDay.description: Time of day when fish was caught (morning, afternoon, evening, night)
